snippet: The writer entered the New York City Marathon lottery several times after moving back to New York six years ago, finally getting in this year. She explains how she trained for her first marathon, a decade ago: She didn’t.
abstract: Selma Kalousek essay describes her satisfaction after being selected for the New York City Marathon lottery after six years of trying; describes unusual circumstances surrounding her first marathon ten years earlier.
lead_paragraph: The writer entered the New York City Marathon lottery several times after moving back to New York six years ago, finally getting in this year. She explains how she trained for her first marathon, a decade ago: She didn’t.

headline.seo: Marathon Training Tips for the Lonely Wife
headline.main: How Cigarettes and Sexual Frustration Got Me Through 26.2 Miles
headline.print_headline: Marathon Training Tips for the Lonely Wife
